title: Forget Mileage Tracking Headaches: MileageWises IRS-Proof Logs Have Your Back!
text: Forget Mileage Tracking Headaches: MileageWises IRS-Proof Logs Have Your Back! MileageWise has updated its mileage app to provide tracking mileage for taxes to new customers and old alike. Further information can be found at https://www.mileagewise.com/. (firmenpresse) - MileageWise has introduced a new element to its mileage app, designed to track mileage for taxes, benefiting both new and existing customers by reducing the time needed to create their mileage logbook. To the delight of many, individuals who own and operate small businesses, often with a few employees, and are looking for a mobile app to track mileage can now take advantage of this new offering from MileageWise. The release has now been officially announced. This update delivers IRS-compliant mileage logs to customers, interested parties, and those active within the small business and gig worker communities. MileageWise achieves this by incorporating the new IRS guidelines, even when creating retrospective logs, ensuring compliance no matter which year the logs are generated for. MileageWise is excited to unveil this latest benefit for both current and new app users, specifically designed to enhance the user experience and better meet the needs of small business owners. Gary Csizmadia, Head of Sales at MileageWise, provided further insight, saying: “The IRS-proof mileage log feature of MileageWise gives peace of mind to anyone needing to track business mileage. You don’t have to worry about missed trips or inaccuracies, which can be stressful when preparing taxes or facing an audit. The IRS requires detailed and accurate logs, and any gaps or discrepancies could lead to fines or denied deductions. MileageWise uses AI to check and correct up to 70 logical conflicts, ensuring your log is bulletproof. One of the coolest features is retrospective log creation. If you missed logging trips, the AI Wizard steps in, using patterns from your past driving history and data from Google Timeline to reconstruct those trips. This not only saves time but also boosts the accuracy of your log. So, even if you’ve forgotten to track a few drives, there’s no need to worry. Another important point is the tool's versatility. Whether you're a small business owner, a gig worker, or someone managing a team of drivers, MileageWise tailors the experience to suit your needs. This isn’t just for freelancers—it’s a powerful tool for any business that depends on accurate mileage logs for tax deductions and reimbursements." MileageWise places a strong emphasis on listening to customers and incorporating feedback wherever possible. This approach helps address issues like missed trips, IRS compliance, and seamless expense tracking. MileageWise aims to save users significant time and effort in managing mileage logs through AI-powered trip tracking, gap-filling, and automated reporting, especially in the small business and gig worker markets. Currently, MileageWise is recognized as a strong, reliable solution in the mileage tracking market, particularly praised for its IRS-proof logs, automated tracking, and its innovative AI Wizard feature. This AI technology allows users to retroactively create and complete mileage logs, filling gaps and ensuring compliance. It’s especially valued by small business owners, self-employed individuals, gig workers, and employers managing teams who need accurate mileage records for tax deductions and reimbursements. Gary Csizmadia is immensely proud of the business, which has been operational for 4 years, and the loyal following of fans and customers they've built. Interested parties who would like to experience MileageWise’s mobile app for tracking mileage are encouraged to visit the website at https://www.mileagewise.com/ for full details and to get started.
